mac_address = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update lock_location set mac_address = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, metadata = #{metadata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lbs = #{lbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lbs_location = #{lbsLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gps_time = #{gpsTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from lock_location where 1 = 1
and mac_address in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by create_date desc
